attributes.action: ENSURE THAT ALL MPS WHO HAVE MADE FRIVOLOUS EXPENSE CLAIMS TO RESIGN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MPs who have made ridiculous claims for expenses should be forced to resign their position as in the green book that approves their expenses it states that they should not make claims for luxurys etc and as we all know a considerable number have made these claims. Lets get rid of these greedy MPs and hopefully we can trust the rest

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
